plugins.name: Figma 3D Animator Studio
plugins.description:
3D Animation Plugin for Figma

From Static to Cinematic Animate 3D Scenes Without Leaving Figma


Bring your designs to life with dynamic 3D animations, directly inside Figma. Whether you're crafting UI concepts, motion prototypes, or storytelling visuals, this plugin lets you seamlessly blend 3D power into your 2D workflow no external tools needed.


Key Features (v1):

Gizmo Controls: Move, rotate, and scale 3D models with intuitive handles


Full Scene Navigation: Orbit, pan, and zoom through a 3D workspace


Multiple Light Sources: Set up ambient, directional, point, spot, or hemisphere lighting


Custom HDRI Lighting: Add realistic environmental lighting using HDRI maps


Outliner Panel: Manage objects, hierarchy, and camera view easily


Transform Keyframes: Animate position, rotation, and scale with smooth transitions


Timeline & Animation Preview: Control frame rate, duration, and scrub through animations


Export Options: Render to MP4, GIF, WebM, or PNG sequences with frame-by-frame control


Built using Three.js, powered by AI tools, and designed to stay right at home in the Figma design environment this plugin is made for designers who want to push boundaries.


Take your prototypes from flat to phenomenal.
plugins.tagline: make your prototypes from flat to phenomenal.

plugins.name: Framenizer - Organize frames with ease
plugins.description:
Framenizer is a Figma plugin designed to help you organize and manage your frames with ease. Whether you are working on a design system or a simple prototype, it streamlines your workflow by automatically organizing your frames.


Key features

  1. Automatic frame arrangement: Quickly organize your frames in either horizontal or vertical layouts with just a few clicks.
  2. Consistent spacing: Maintain a clean and professional look with consistent spacing between all your frames.
  3. Section titles: Add descriptive titles to your frame groups for better organization and documentation.
  4. Section wrapping: Group related frames together by wrapping them in dedicated sections.
  5. Naming options: Choose between preserving your original frame names or using automatic naming conventions.
  6. Support and feedback: Constantly improving the plugin based on your input.


Need help or have suggestions?

I am always looking to improve the plugin. If you have any questions, encounter issues, or have ideas for new features, please don't hesitate to reach out to me at achmadalimin.com or Linkedin.

accepted.name: Achmad Alimin
accepted.description: Product Designer

plugins.tagline: Help you organize and manage your frames with ease.

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.name: Mike
accepted.description:
Premium app design for startups.
Tools to level up designers.

plugins.tagline: Live Dynamic Type Preview

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

plugins.name: Storylane: Turn Figma into AI-interactive demos
plugins.description:
From Figma screens to killer product demos - powered by AI


Convert your Figma designs into interactive product demos in just a few clicks. Storylane lets you build personalized, AI-enhanced demos directly from your Figma frames - ready for sales, marketing, and presales teams to share across channels.


How it works?

1. Download and open the Storylane plugin

Install the Storylane plugin and open it in your Figma file.

2. Choose which Figma frames to export

Select All frames or just the ones you've highlighted.

3. Pick your destination and click “Create New Demo"

Instantly export your frames to a new demo or to an existing one in Storylane.

4. Fine-tune and enhance with AI features in the Storylane editor

Add voiceovers, guides, personalization, and more — no code needed.

5. Share the interactive demo across channels and track engagement

Embed on websites, use in emails, or send in sales calls — with real-time analytics.


Benefits

  1. Gather actionable feedback before development begins
  2. Showcase the product with just mockups when pitching to investors
  3. Connect design, marketing and sales with a single source of truth


Popular features

  1. AI demo creation - Add professional voiceovers, guides, and annotations in seconds
  2. 6+ guide types - Multiple guide types available to create the perfect interactive experience
  3. Instant personalization - Personalize content to prospects without rebuilding demos
  4. AI video avatars - Choose lifelike stock avatars or your replicas to narrate your product story
  5. Multilingual capability - Create demos in 25+ languages with 63+ voice options
  6. Multi-chapter demos - Create choose-your-own-adventure experiences so buyers can explore what matters most to them
  7. Lead generation - Use native or custom lead forms to collect leads at the right moment
  8. Conversion boosters - Add always-available CTAs that significantly increases CTR rate


Deploy anywhere

  1. Embed on websites to convert visitors
  2. Attach to emails for higher engagement
  3. Create immersive offline event experiences
  4. Share as leave-behinds after sales calls
  5. Build custom demo hubs for buying committees


Join 4000+ marketing and sales teams who use Storylane to turn designs into measurable business impact.

Proof of trust - 600+ reviews and the highest satisfaction rating on G2.


First time using Storylane?

See how it works by exploring our interactive product demo or sign up for a free account to get started right away.


For personalized guidance, schedule a call with a demo expert who can show you how to maximize your results.
plugins.tagline: From Figma mockups to interactive demos for feedback, pitching, and showcasing

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: Layer Name Modifier
plugins.description:
The Layer Name Modifier plugin makes it much easier to organize and manage your layer names in Figma, helping you keep your projects more organized and consistent. With this plugin, you can perform the following actions:


  1. Add a Text to Layer Names: Easily append a word of your choice to the end of layer names.
  2. Remove a Text from Layer Names: Quickly remove any unwanted word from the layer names.
  3. Remove a Text from Only the Last Words of Layer Names: Use this feature to remove a specific word only from the last words of the layer names.

This plugin is a perfect tool for organizing and standardizing layer names, especially in large projects. Save time and make your workflow more efficient!


HOW TO USE THIS PLUGIN?

Add text to layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to add t text o the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Enter the text you want to add to the layer names into the input.
  4. When you click the Add Text button, the text you entered is added to the layer name.


Remove text from layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to remove texts from the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Select the "Remove text" checkbox.
  4. Enter the text you want to remove from the layer names into the input.
  5. When you click the "Remove text" button, the relevant word in the selected layers is removed.
  6. If you only want to process the last words of the layer name, check the relevant checkbox.
  7. When you click the Remove Text button, the text you entered into the input is deleted if it is the last word of the layer name.
plugins.tagline: Layer Name Modifier helps organize and manage layer names in Figma, keeping projects consistent.

113351.name: Layer Name Modifier
113351.description:
The Layer Name Modifier plugin makes it much easier to organize and manage your layer names in Figma, helping you keep your projects more organized and consistent. With this plugin, you can perform the following actions:


  1. Add a Text to Layer Names: Easily append a word of your choice to the end of layer names.
  2. Remove a Text from Layer Names: Quickly remove any unwanted word from the layer names.
  3. Remove a Text from Only the Last Words of Layer Names: Use this feature to remove a specific word only from the last words of the layer names.

This plugin is a perfect tool for organizing and standardizing layer names, especially in large projects. Save time and make your workflow more efficient!


HOW TO USE THIS PLUGIN?

Add text to layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to add t text o the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Enter the text you want to add to the layer names into the input.
  4. When you click the Add Text button, the text you entered is added to the layer name.


Remove text from layer name

  1. Select the layers you want to remove texts from the layer names.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Select the "Remove text" checkbox.
  4. Enter the text you want to remove from the layer names into the input.
  5. When you click the "Remove text" button, the relevant word in the selected layers is removed.
  6. If you only want to process the last words of the layer name, check the relevant checkbox.
  7. When you click the Remove Text button, the text you entered into the input is deleted if it is the last word of the layer name.
113351.tagline: Layer Name Modifier helps organize and manage layer names in Figma, keeping projects consistent.

plugins.name: Mots AI
plugins.description:
Elevate your UI designs with this intelligent Figma plugin that generates smart, context-aware text tailored to your needs. Powered by advanced AI technology, it streamlines your content creation process, allowing you to quickly produce engaging copy for various UI components.


Seamless Integration:


This plugin seamlessly integrates with your existing Figma workflow. Simply highlight the text area in your design that requires content, specify the context, and select the appropriate UI component. It will generate customized, realistic text that perfectly complements your design, saving you valuable time and effort.


Intuitive User Experience:


Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this plugin boasts an intuitive interface that allows designers to focus on their creative process. It currently supports English language generation, with plans to expand language support in future updates. The plugin adapts to your needs, making it an indispensable tool for designers seeking to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.


How to use this plugin:


Select text area:


Highlight the text layer or frame in your Figma design where you need content generated.


Provide context:


Specify the context of your design, such as the user story and acceptance criteria, to ensure the plugin generates relevant and appropriate text.


Choose UI component:


Select the specific UI component (e.g., button, link) for which you need text.


Generate and refine:


Let the plugin work its magic. Review the generated text and, if needed, refine it to achieve the perfect fit for your design.


—



Got more ideas?


Send them our way at contact@juny.com


www.juny.ai

Transform your Figma workspace with sophisticated typography that stands out. UniBold converts standard text into elegant mathematical sans-serif bold characters, creating visual hierarchy and professional organization throughout your design files.


Why designers love UniBold:

  1. Create instant visual distinction between sections and components
  2. Maintain consistent typographic hierarchy across all projects
  3. Improve team navigation with clearly emphasized page names
  4. Enhance presentation-ready files with polished page organization


Getting started is simple:

  1. Select the page you want to restyle

  3. Apply the new bold Unicode style to your page name with a single click


Elevate your file organization from functional to exceptional. UniBold transforms the mundane task of page naming into an opportunity for refined design thinking—because even the smallest details deserve attention.

plugins.name: logoplacer
plugins.description:
Logo Placer simplifies the process of adding multiple logos to your designs while maintaining clean spacing and visual consistency. Perfect for partner sections, client showcases, sponsor walls, and more.


Features:

Upload up to 4 logos with automatic placement

Smart resizing that maintains logo aspect ratios

Multi-frame support – Select multiple frames and place logos simultaneously

Dynamic scaling based on frame size

Equal spacing between logos, every time

Reset button to quickly start over

Clean and intuitive interface


Ideal For:

Creating partner/client sections

Designing sponsor walls

Showcasing collaborations

Building marketing materials

Presenting design portfolios


How to Use:

  1. Select one or more frames in your design
  2. Open the Logo Placer plugin
  3. Upload up to 4 logos
  4. Watch as they're automatically resized, placed, and spaced
  5. Hit reset to start fresh anytime


Why Use Logo Placer?

When you have a lot of design assets and deadlines, placing logos manually can be tedious and error-prone. You often deal with:


  1. Inconsistent sizing
  2. Uneven spacing
  3. Manual alignment headaches

Logo Placer removes that friction by automating placement and ensuring a professional layout every time—no grids, nudging, or guesswork needed.
plugins.tagline: "Automatically arrange and space multiple logos in your designs"

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%
